EmailTemplate.name: 07_30_2014 vCloud Director WP.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Whitepaper: Maximize Your vCloud Director Lifecycle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Whether you're a SP running vCD, or an Enterprise who purchased before the split, vCloud Director has a lot of fight left. VMware's 2013 announcement <http://blogs.vmware.com/vsphere/2013/09/vcloud-director-convergence-and-transition-plan-whats-the-scoop.html> of vCloud Director's fusion with vCAC and vSphere left many purchasers puzzled: why was I sold this tool that I now have to trade-in (and pay-up) for a newer model with less functionality?
vCloud Director created tremendous potential for Service Providers and Enterprises to deliver agile and cost effective Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) to clients. Its dismantling among enterprises was a blow to many organizations.
Good news: vCD has a lot of fight left. Read this whitepaper and learn how to maximize return on your investment in vCloud Director <http://go.vmturbo.com/wp-reducing-costs-in-vcloud-environments.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vcd>. Get Free Whitepaper <http://go.vmturbo.com/wp-reducing-costs-in-vcloud-environments.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vcd> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
